commit.message: px4_fmu-v4_stackcheck sync with default and increase pmw3901 main stack

verification.payload:
tree e53241f224913d0db61d1c7f8167ecfa404a9885
parent 6f9a9b3d2c90faca79ff42b7dd08df6e97051c00
author Daniel Agar <daniel@agar.ca> 1548789269 -0500
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1548789269 -0500

px4_fmu-v4_stackcheck sync with default and increase pmw3901 main stack

files.patch:
@@ -18,25 +18,26 @@ px4_add_board(
 	DRIVERS
 		barometer # all available barometer drivers
 		batt_smbus
-		lights/blinkm
 		camera_trigger
 		differential_pressure # all available differential pressure drivers
 		distance_sensor # all available distance sensor drivers
 		gps
 		heater
 		imu # all available imu drivers
 		irlock
+		lights/blinkm
+		lights/oreoled
+		lights/rgbled
+		lights/rgbled_ncp5623c
 		magnetometer # all available magnetometer drivers
 		mkblctrl
-		lights/oreoled
 		pca9685
+		pmw3901
 		pwm_input
 		pwm_out_sim
 		px4flow
 		px4fmu
 		rc_input
-		lights/rgbled
-		lights/rgbled_ncp5623c
 		stm32
 		stm32/adc
 		stm32/tone_alarm
@@ -103,6 +104,7 @@ px4_add_board(
 		#hello
 		#hwtest # Hardware test
 		#matlab_csv_serial
+		#position_estimator_inav
 		#px4_mavlink_debug # Tutorial code from https://px4.io/dev/debug_values
 		#px4_simple_app # Tutorial code from https://px4.io/dev/px4_simple_app
 		#rover_steering_control # Rover example app

@@ -1,7 +1,40 @@

 px4_add_module(
 	MODULE drivers__pmw3901
 	MAIN pmw3901
+	STACK_MAIN 1200
 	SRCS
 		pmw3901.cpp
 	)
